title: Assigned covered parking, Sparkling swimming pool with sun deck & BBQ
posting_body: Welcome to Pleasanton Heights Apartment Homes!

Pleasanton Heights is a beautiful community nestled in a residential neighborhood within walking distance to downtown Pleasanton, where restaurants, boutiques, and one of a kind shops line the streets.
On Friday nights, enjoy Free Concerts in the Park; every Saturday, shop the Farmer's Market; and throughout the year, enjoy a variety of fun-filled activities.
The apartment homes at Pleasanton Heights have been upgraded with granite countertops, Whirlpool stainless steel appliances, and plank flooring on ground level units (bedrooms are carpeted).
- Sparkling swimming pool with sun deck
- Beautiful views of the Pleasanton Hills and Mt. Diablo
- Many options to pay rent including, credit card, on-line and ACH
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
